<H1>Bonnie Vent sets the record straight. The History Detectives on PBS exa=
mines who invented the Psycho-phone and Edison's interest in building a dev=
ice to speak to the dead. </H1>
<P>Dallas and Vicki Childress contacte=
d History Detectives about a device that they won at an auction in 2003.&nb=
sp; Bonnie Vent worked directly with Vicki Childress in 2003 and wants to s=
et the record straight that she did not tell Vicki Childress as fact that E=
dison invented her device or that her device was used to speak to the dead.=
  In actuality the research done by History Detectives matches our res=
earch.</P>

ation provided by History Detectives.  We are happy to report that the=
